price: E, por certo, damos a vida e damos a morte; e Nós somos O Herdeiro.
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lanaḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wanaḥnu al-wārithūna
